job.title: Solutions Architect - Remote
job.description: Who We AreNacelle was built for technology-forward merchants drawn to the benefits of a headless architecture but dissatisfied with the costs and complexity associated with adoption. Leaders at FTD.com, Boll & Branch, and Thinx use Nacelle to eliminate the typical maintenance costs and infrastructure complexities related to going headless while accelerating their time-to-market. Unlike traditional commerce solutions, our product is built on event-driven and elastic core technology optimized for flexibility, performance, and customization.Nacelle is an early stage, venture-backed, fully remote company. Recently closing our Series A round for $18m, our institutional investors include Index Ventures, Inovia and more. We also have raised from notable industry angels including leaders from Shopify Plus, Attentive, and Klaviyo.The RoleWe are seeking an experienced Solutions Architect to be part of a team that is responsible for overseeing the success of our customer’s technical deployments. The SA will work directly with customers and agency partners to deploy Nacelle. This person must be a self-starter and used to a fast-paced, energetic environment. They are comfortable dealing with ambiguity. Ultimately, this person should be passionate about solving the customer’s business problems and the technical challenges that accompany them.This role will report directly to the Director of Solutions Architecture and will work closely with Sales, Customer Success, and Product teams.Responsibilities IncludeBe a technical expert in all aspects of NacelleManage activities that take place during solution ideation, solution design, and solution implementationFacilitate discovery sessions to design full-featured Progressive Web Applications (PWAs) for Nacelle’s customersFacilitate eCommerce technology stack assessments and provide recommendations to improve systems and business workflow processes; including prototype developmentWork hands-on with customers to demonstrate headless architecture best practices, including ensuring knowledge transfer so customers are properly enabled and are able to extend the capabilities of Nacelle on their ownWork with customer in-house development teams and system integrators at a deep technical level to successfully position and deploy Nacelle in customer environmentsMaintain a deep understanding of competitive and complementary technologies and vendors and how to position Nacelle in relation to themProvide guidance on content and data modelingProvide analysis of performance and best practice code audits throughout the implementationProvide guidance on how to resolve customer-specific technical challenges during implementation and deploymentSkills & Qualifications5-8 years of experience working with enterprise customers in pre-sales or post-sales technical role at a SaaS companyExperience delivering digital projects that extensively use Graph QL or RESTful APIsHands on experience working on projects that utilize microservices-based architectureEfficient communication skills (written, verbal, and presentation)Development experience with frontend languages like HTML, CSS, and Javascript (React and Vue)Experience with backend technologies and languages like: PHP, Python, Node.js, Redis, MySQL/PostgreSQL, Amazon Web Services (AWS) Proven experience in engineering and software architecture designWorking experience with data modeling and/or content modelingPrevious project or product management experienceAbility to influence and manage a room; this role requires work with a variety of stakeholdersNice To HaveExperience with modern frontends: Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Next.js and React Experience building Progressive Web Applications (PWAs)eCommerce technology experienceRemote work experienceExperience with Atlassian (Jira Service Desk, Jira, Confluence) Venture-backed startup experienceBenefits & PerksRobust health benefits packagesFull support for remote work, including a stipend for getting your home work space setup Home internet plan paid for monthlyUnlimited PTOAn extremely enthusiastic team that appreciates collaboration
